verses.verse: O Lord, <S%H3068><s%> Thou art my God; <S%H430><s%> I will exalt <S%H7311><s%> Thee, I will give <S%H3034><s%> thanks <S%H3034><s%> to Thy name; <S%H8034><s%> For Thou hast worked <S%H6213><s%> wonders, <S%H6382><s%> Plans <S%H6098><s%> [formed] long <S%H7350><s%> ago, <S%H7350><s%> with perfect <S%H544><s%> faithfulness. <S%H544><s%>

For Thou hast made <S%H7760><s%> a city <S%H5892><s%> into a heap, <S%H1530><s%> A fortified <S%H1219><s%> city <S%H7151><s%> into a ruin; <S%H9281><s%> A palace <S%H759><s%> of strangers <S%H2114><s%> is a city <S%H5892><s%> no <S%H4480><s%> more, <S%H4480><s%> It will never <S%H5769><s%> <S%H3808><s%> be rebuilt. <S%H1129><s%>

Therefore <S%H5921><s%> <S%H3651><s%> a strong <S%H5794><s%> people <S%H5971><s%> will glorify <S%H3513><s%> Thee; Cities <S%H7151><s%> of ruthless <S%H6184><s%> nations <S%H1471><s%> will revere <S%H3372><s%> Thee.

For Thou hast been <S%H1961><s%> a defense <S%H4581><s%> for the helpless, <S%H1800><s%> A defense <S%H4581><s%> for the needy <S%H34><s%> in his distress, <S%H9496><s%> A refuge <S%H4268><s%> from the storm, <S%H2230><s%> a shade <S%H6738><s%> from the heat; <S%H2721><s%> For the breath <S%H7307><s%> of the ruthless <S%H6184><s%> Is like a [rain] storm <S%H2230><s%> [against] a wall. <S%H7023><s%>

Like heat <S%H2721><s%> in drought, <S%H6724><s%> Thou dost subdue <S%H3665><s%> the uproar <S%H7588><s%> of aliens; <S%H2114><s%> [Like] heat <S%H2721><s%> by the shadow <S%H6738><s%> of a cloud, <S%H5645><s%> the song <S%H2158><s%> of the ruthless <S%H6184><s%> is silenced. <S%H6031><s%>

And the Lord <S%H3068><s%> of hosts <S%H6635><s%> will prepare <S%H6213><s%> a lavish <S%H8081><s%> banquet <S%H4960><s%> for all <S%H3605><s%> peoples <S%H5971><s%> on this <S%H2088><s%> mountain; <S%H2022><s%> A banquet <S%H4960><s%> of aged <S%H8105><s%> wine, <S%H8105><s%> choice <S%H8081><s%> pieces with marrow, <S%H9257><s%> [And] refined, <S%H2212><s%> aged <S%H8105><s%> wine. <S%H8105><s%>

And on this <S%H2088><s%> mountain <S%H2022><s%> He will swallow <S%H1104><s%> up the covering <S%H6440><s%> <S%H3875><s%> which is over <S%H5921><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> peoples, <S%H5971><s%> Even the veil <S%H9276><s%> which is stretched <S%H5259><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> nations. <S%H1471><s%>

He will swallow <S%H1104><s%> up death <S%H4194><s%> for all <S%H5331><s%> time, <S%H5331><s%> And the Lord <S%H136><s%> God <S%H3068><s%> will wipe <S%H4229><s%> tears <S%H1832><s%> away <S%H4229><s%> from all <S%H3605><s%> faces, <S%H6440><s%> And He will remove <S%H5493><s%> the reproach <S%H2781><s%> of His people <S%H5971><s%> from all <S%H3605><s%> the earth; <S%H776><s%> For the Lord <S%H3068><s%> has spoken. <S%H1696><s%>

And it will be said <S%H559><s%> in that day, <S%H3117><s%> "Behold, <S%H2009><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> is our God <S%H430><s%> for whom we have waited <S%H6960><s%> that He might save <S%H3467><s%> us. This <S%H2088><s%> is the Lord <S%H3068><s%> for whom we have waited; <S%H6960><s%> Let us rejoice <S%H1523><s%> and be glad <S%H8055><s%> in His salvation. <S%H3444><s%>"

For the hand <S%H3027><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> will rest <S%H5117><s%> on this <S%H2088><s%> mountain, <S%H2022><s%> And Moab <S%H4124><s%> will be trodden <S%H1758><s%> down <S%H1758><s%> in his place <S%H8478><s%> As straw <S%H4963><s%> is trodden <S%H1758><s%> down <S%H1758><s%> in the water <S%H4325><s%> of a manure <S%H4087><s%> pile. <S%H4087><s%>

And he will spread <S%H6566><s%> out his hands <S%H3027><s%> in the middle <S%H7130><s%> of it As a swimmer <S%H7811><s%> spreads <S%H6566><s%> out [his hands <S%H3027><s%>] to swim, <S%H7811><s%> But [the Lord] will lay <S%H8213><s%> low <S%H8213><s%> his pride <S%H1346><s%> together <S%H5973><s%> with the trickery <S%H698><s%> of his hands.

And the unassailable <S%H4869><s%> fortifications <S%H4013><s%> of your walls <S%H2346><s%> He will bring <S%H7817><s%> down, <S%H7817><s%> Lay <S%H8213><s%> low, <S%H8213><s%> [and] cast <S%H5060><s%> to the ground, <S%H776><s%> even <S%H5704><s%> to the dust. <S%H6083><s%>
